original_text: Surely there was not holden such a passover from the days of the judges that judged Israel, nor in all the days of the kings of Israel, nor of the kings of Judah;
korean_text: 사사가 이스라엘을 다스리던 시대부터 이스라엘 여러 왕의 시대와 유다 여러 왕의 시대에 이렇게 유월절을 지킨 일이 없었더니

sentences.original_text: Surely there was not holden such a passover
from days of the judges that judged Israel
nor in all the days of kings of Israel
nor of the kings of Judah
